email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. I have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. She’s a 150,000 DWT tanker with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. My starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the laycan is firm? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $45.50 is a bit tight given current market conditions. I could potentially come down to $49.00 per metric ton, but that’s as low as I can go. The laycan is firm, and the vessel is ready to load within that window. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the flexibility. $49.00 is still a bit high for us, but I can propose a middle ground at $47.25 per metric ton. If you can agree to this, we can proceed with the fixture. Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your response. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I appreciate your offer. After discussing with the owners, we can agree to $47.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. If this works for you, I’ll draft the fixture note. Let me know. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, that sounds good. Let’s proceed at $47.25 per metric ton with the demurrage rate as stated. Please send over the fixture note, and we’ll finalize the details. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Fixture Note for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as agreed, I’ve attached the fixture note for your review. The details are as follows: MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, Houston to Rotterdam, laycan 15-20 October, freight rate $47.25 per metric ton, demurrage $20,000 per day. Please confirm once reviewed. Best regards, Sarah.
